mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_username, user_password, user_tel, user_email, user_name, user_birthday, user_zipcode, user_street_addr, user_detail_addr1, user_detail_addr2, user_rdate, user_status, user_profile) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{zipcode}, #{streetAddr}, #{detailAddr1}, #{detailAddr2}, #{regDate}, #{status}, #{profile});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_username AS userUsername, user_password AS userPassword, user_tel AS userTel, user_email AS userEmail, user_name AS userName, user_birthday AS userBirthday, user_zipcode AS userZipcode, user_detail_addr1 AS userDetailAddr1, user_detail_addr2 AS userDetailAddr2, user_street_addr AS userStreetAddr, user_rdate AS userRegDate, user_status AS userStatus, user_profile AS userProfile FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_tel = #{userTel}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_name = #{userName}, user_zipcode = #{userZipcode}, user_street_addr = #{userStreetAddr}, user_detail_addr1 = #{userDetailAddr1}, user_detail_addr2 = #{userDetailAddr2}, user_profile = #{userProfile} WHERE user_id = #{userId};
